body: Hello. I need someone to do the XML on a map. Comment down below if you can. Thanks!
body_tagged: Hello. I need someone to do the XML on a map. Comment down below if you can. Thanks!
title: I need help with XML

replies.body:
Hi EDJM9!

Look in here for ideas. Just find the gamemode for your type of map, look at the current xml for a map that is similar to yours, copy the xml (cut/paste into notepad), then change the xml to fit your map.

https://maps.avicus.net/atlas/

That's what I've done in the past. :)
